title: Bug 6536 - Adding Javadoc on field in Type Hierarchy does nothing
description: When attempting to add Javadoc on a field in the Type Hierarchy view, nothing happens.
OB: The Javadoc pop-up or dialogue box does not appear when trying to add Javadoc on a field in the Type Hierarchy view.
EB: When selecting a field in the Type Hierarchy view and trying to add Javadoc, a pop-up or dialogue box should appear to allow the user to add the Javadoc.
SR:
1. Open the Type Hierarchy view.
2. Select a field in the Type Hierarchy view.
3. Attempt to add Javadoc on the selected field.
4. Verify that the Javadoc pop-up or dialogue box appears where the user can add the Javadoc for the field.
